sourcesContent:
{{title}}

Full-Stack Web Developer

"Resposible for leading the designing, development, testing, debugging, maintaining and documenting software components in accordance to Software Development Life Cycle(SDLC) best practices. I'm holding overall responsibility in the technical design process and completes estimates and work plans for design, development, implementation, and rollout tasks. Also communicates with Belgium clients to ensure that assignmentsare delivered with highest of quality and in accordance to the standards. I strives to continuously improve the software delivery processes and practices."

Responsibilities
  • Developing Web applications using ASP.Net(MVC), Web API, Javascript(Jquery, KnockoutJs, AngularJs/ VueJs,...etc.), HTML5, SCSS & MS SQL.
Tools & Technologies
  • ASP.NET/ .NET CORE
July 2017 - Present | Colombo, SL
import { Component, Input} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-experience', templateUrl: './experience.component.html', styleUrls: ['./experience.component.scss'] }) export class ExperienceComponent { @Input() title:string = "Mes expériences"; }
